messages.title: A Record of Delivery. A Promise of More.
messages.content: 2010-2015 A RECORD OF DELIVERY: Cut the deficit by half, reducing borrowing by £3,000 for every household in Britain. Given an £800 tax cut to low and middle income workers. Increased the health budget each year to improve services and deliver 6,000 more doctors. Provided an extra £2.5bn a year for struggling school children. 2015-2020 A PROMISE OF MORE: Finish the job of balancing the books, on time and fairly. Cut Income Tax by a further £400 for ordinary workers. Guarantee mental health equality by increasing health spending by £8bn a year. Protect education spending from cradle to college.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cut the deficit by half, reducing borrowing by £3,000 for every household in Britain. Finish the job of balancing the books, on time and fairly.
Given an £800 tax cut to low and middle income workers. Cut Income Tax by a further £400 for ordinary workers.
Increased the health budget each year to improve services and deliver 6,000 more doctors. Guarantee mental health equality by increasing health spending by £8bn a year.
Provided an extra £2.5bn a year for struggling school children. Protect education spending from cradle to college.

issues.economy: Cut the deficit by half, reducing borrowing by £3,000 for every household in Britain.
issues.education: Provided an extra £2.5bn a year for struggling school children. Protect education spending from cradle to college.
issues.health: Increased the health budget each year to improve services and deliver 6,000 more doctors. Guarantee mental health equality by increasing health spending by £8bn a year.

leaflet.personalStatement: Chika is a qualified Pharmaceutical Scientist and the Founder and Director of Cambridge Leadership Academy; an organisation that focuses on transforming young adults into great leaders. She is determined to help deliver first class education to all children and young people.

quotes.text: Liberal Democrats in Government have helped by investing over £12 million for local schools in Ipswich. 52,600 people in Ipswich have had an £800 tax cut since 2010.

images.caption: Chika Akinwale with an unidentified man.

leaflet.additionalNotes: 3 great reasons to vote for Chika Akinwale: 1. Chika is passionate to help young people from all backgrounds develop their talents as leaders especially those denied opportunity by personal circumstances. 2. Liberal Democrats in Government have helped by investing over £12 million for local schools in Ipswich. 52,600 people in Ipswich have had an £800 tax cut since 2010. 3. Chika Akinwale will defend civil liberties, your basic human rights, and fight for our health service.
